Implement Newsletter Subscription Using Staticmanhttps://ruddra.com/posts/implement-newsletters-using-staticman/Thu, 12 Dec 2019 00:12:08 +0600https://ruddra.com/posts/implement-newsletters-using-staticman/In this article, I am going to share how you can set up a newsletter subscription using Staticman. No need to use third party newsletter subscription services. Collecting data in static sites or serverless sites(with POST request) is a hassle because you don’t have a server to receive POST requests and store data.
